testcase.title: To verify the Fields in PPT download Popup

steps.title: I logged in as a "CTDrug" user with access to "Bazooka" project
I perform Quick Search by "100011"

substeps.message: User is navigated to Drugs report type

steps.title: I navigate to report type "Drugs" on page 'Results'
I verify 'Prediction' button is displayed on page 'Results'
I click on button 'Prediction' on page 'Results'
I verify a new pop-up 'Success Predictor' is opened

substeps.message: Timeline & Success Rates header is  displayed

steps.title: I verify "Timeline & Success Rates" header is displayed in Success Predictor Pop Up
I select 1 drugs rows in 'Timeline & Success Rates' pop-up

substeps.message: Predict button is clicked on Timeline & Success Rates Popup

steps.title: I click on 'Predict' button
I select 1 drugs rows in the Predictor download page of 'Timeline & Success Rates' pop-up
I click on Download button in 'Timeline & Success Rates' pop-up
I click on PowerPoint format to download

substeps.message: the power point fields in download Prediction pop-up  is  displayed

steps.title: I Verify the fields "Primary Color,Include prediction details and events,Separate prediction in Pages"
I click on Primary Color
I select the color "Lemon"

testcase.title: To verify the Primary and secondary color in PPT download Popup from the particular drug report page

steps.title: I logged in as a "CTDrug" user with access to "Bazooka" project
I perform Quick Search by "PTI-808"

substeps.message: User is navigated to Drugs report type

steps.title: I navigate to report type "Drugs" on page 'Results'
I click on 1 report link from the results table
I verify 'Prediction' button is displayed on page 'Results'
I click on button 'Prediction' on page 'Results'
I verify a new pop-up 'Success Predictor' is opened

substeps.message: Timeline & Success Rates header is  displayed

steps.title: I verify "Timeline & Success Rates" header is displayed in Success Predictor Pop Up
I select 1 drugs rows in 'Timeline & Success Rates' pop-up

substeps.message: Predict button is clicked on Timeline & Success Rates Popup

steps.title: I click on 'Predict' button
I select 1 drugs rows in the Predictor download page of 'Timeline & Success Rates' pop-up
I click on Download button in 'Timeline & Success Rates' pop-up
I click on PowerPoint format to download

substeps.message: the power point fields in download Prediction pop-up  is  displayed

steps.title: I Verify the fields "Primary Color,Include Zoom Views of Development Phases,Secondary Color"
I click on Primary Color
I select the color "Red"
I click on the Secondary Color
I select the secondary color "Blue"

testcase.title: Verify predictions are downloaded as PPT

steps.title: I logged in as a "CTDrug" user with access to "Bazooka" project
I perform Quick Search by "PTI-808"

substeps.message: User is navigated to Drugs report type

steps.title: I navigate to report type "Drugs" on page 'Results'
I verify 'Prediction' button is displayed on page 'Results'
I click on button 'Prediction' on page 'Results'
I verify a new pop-up 'Success Predictor' is opened

substeps.message: Timeline & Success Rates header is  displayed

I select the color "Red"
I click on the Secondary Color

I click on 'Download' button in 'Download Prediction popup'
I perform Prediction Export in "pptx" format
